snippet: Following a leaguewide trend, the Jets announced on Tuesday that they would hold their training camp at their headquarters in New Jersey.
abstract: New York Jets say they will hold training camp at headquarters in Florham Park, NJ, rather than former site in Cortland, NY; other NFL news noted.
lead_paragraph: Following a leaguewide trend, the Jets announced on Tuesday that they would hold their training camp at their headquarters in New Jersey.

headline.main: Jets to Stay in Florham Park for Training Camp
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Football; Jets to Shift Site of Camp
